name: Frightfur Repair
description: Target 1 "Frightfur" Fusion Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, then you can Special Summon 1 "Fluffal" or "Edge Imp" monster from your GY. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Fluffal" or "Edge Imp" monster from your hand. You can only use 1 "Frightfur Repair" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
